DataElement.preferredName: Assay Instrumentation Technology Platform Approved By Food and Drug Administration Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response to a question that asks whether or not the FDA has cleared the specific version (manufacturer, model, etc.) of a technology that is used to carry out a laboratory or computational experiment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Assay Instrumentation Technology Platform Approved By Food and Drug Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug._Any object, or item of electrical or electronic equipment, which is designed to carry out a specific function or set of functions._The specific version (manufacturer, model, etc.) of a technology that is used to carry out a laboratory or computational experiment._Indicates the person or authoritative body who has given approval._One of the agencies of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. It assures the safety of foods and cosmetics, and the safety and efficacy of pharmaceuticals, biological products, radiation emitting products, medical devices, and also, animal feed and drugs.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Any object, or item of electrical or electronic equipment, which is designed to carry out a specific function or set of functions.:The specific version (manufacturer, model, etc.) of a technology that is used to carry out a laboratory or computational experiment.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
Any object, or item of electrical or electronic equipment, which is designed to carry out a specific function or set of functions.
The specific version (manufacturer, model, etc.) of a technology that is used to carry out a laboratory or computational experiment.

Property.preferredName: Approved By Food and Drug Administration

It assures the safety of foods and cosmetics, and the safety and efficacy of pharmaceuticals, biological products, radiation emitting products, medical devices, and also, animal feed and drugs.

Concepts.definition: Indicates the person or authoritative body who has given approval.

One of the agencies of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. It assures the safety of foods and cosmetics, and the safety and efficacy of pharmaceuticals, biological products, radiation emitting products, medical devices, and also, animal feed and drugs.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text terms to determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
